Package com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SceneObject.SceneObjectClassMask  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetManager
    This class manages access to the texture and shader loader classes.
    Effect
    Abstract class that is the base for all the effects in the engine.
    EngineSettings
    This is a class that contains all of the settings for the engines graphics and audio pipelines.
    Game  
    Game.SystemExitAction
    Class that is designed to hold any system shutdown actions that need to be performed.
    GameConfiguration
    This class contains the configuration for the game.
    InputHandler
    singleton class that handles input
    InputSnapshot  
    Scene
    This class is the basic building block of a game.
    SceneEffectsManager
    This class handles special effects that take place in the scene such as scene fades, transitions, screen shake, etc.
    SceneEffectsManager.PostEffectExecutor  
    SceneObject
    SceneObjects are the main building blocks of the game.
    SceneObjectManager
    This class keeps mappings of all the scene objects in the current scene.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EngineSettings.ParticleDensity  
    Scene.Layer  
    SceneObject.CoreClasses  
    SceneObject.CoreGroups
